imageData.title: Batting Points
imageData.description: Any player scoring a century will only get points for the century. No points will be awarded for their half-century. Additionally, no points are awarded for centuries in T10 matches.

imageData.title: Fielding Points
imageData.description: In case a run out involves 3 or more players from the fielding team, points will be awarded only to the last 2 players that caused the run out.

imageData.title: Strike Rate (Except Bowler) Points
imageData.description: Negative points for low batting Strike Rates are only applicable for individual Strike Rates below 70 runs per 100 balls.
